original_text: Your city is full of the noise of parties, and people are shouting. It was not war that killed the people who are lying in your streets. They did not die in a battle.
korean_text: 소란하며 떠들던 성, 즐거워하던 고을이여 너의 죽임을 당한 자들은 칼에 죽은 것도 아니요 전쟁에 사망한 것도 아니라

sentences.original_text: Your city is full of the noise of parties
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 도시는 파티 소음으로 가득 차 있구나

sentences.original_text: It was not war that killed the people
who are lying in your streets
They did not die in a battle
